com.bitplan.simplegraph.core

Interface SimpleGraph

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    SimpleNode, SimpleSystem
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ExcelSystem, FileNode, FileSystem, GitHubSystem, HtmlNode, HtmlSystem, JavaASTNode, JavaSourceNode, JavaSystem, JsonNode, JsonSystem, MapNode, MapSystem, MediaWikiPageNode, MediaWikiSystem, PdfNode, PdfSystem, PowerPointSystem, RowNode, SheetNode, SimpleGraphImpl, SimpleNodeImpl, SimpleSystemImpl, SlideNode, SlideShowNode, SmwSystem, SNMPNode, SNMPSystem, SQLRecord, SQLSystem, TripleNode, TripleStoreSystem, WikiDataNode, WikiDataSystem, WordNode, WordSystem, WorkBookNode, XmlNode, XmlSystem

    public interface SimpleGraph
    The Simple Graph interface is inspired by the mathematical concept of a graph: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Graph_(discrete_mathematics) it wraps an Apache Tinkerpop / Gremlin Graph and allows generic graph traversals a graph can also be used in cases where you'd normally use lists, tables and trees - the graph is the more general concept
    Author:
    wf
